dmca.title: DMCA (Copyright) Complaint to Google
dmca.body:
AutoDetectedBrowser: Google Chrome
AutoDetectedOS: Windows 7
IIILanguage: en
IssueType: lr_circumvention
Language: en
agree: checked
circumvention_additional_comments: Please delete this blog as soon as  
possible.
circumvention_injured: No
circumvention_what_product: Dear Sir,

There has been a defamatory blog with my private information and the book  
that I have published with Elsevier publishing group following the news  
about a one of the co-authors (Dr. Mohsen Hosseinkhani) who has contributed  
a book chapter to my book.

http://sciefy.blogspot.com/2012/01/karthikeyan-subramani-nanotechnology.html

Can you kindly remove the blog posted with my private information (with my  
work place) and the weblink that leads to my book published by Elsevier (a  
leading science & Medical book publishing group) for which a Nobel Laureate  
has written the foreword.

Some one has created a fake profile and posted such a defamatory blog with  
personal/professional vendatta.

So please remove the blog and warn the person who has posted such a blog. I  
look forward for your removal of the blog as soon as possible.

Thank you,

Karthikeyan Subramani.
(Email:subramani.karthikeyan@googlemail.com)
